document.full_text: foreign companies bidding for public projects in china, valued at $1 trillion a year, face a sharply tilted playing field, a european union business lobby said wednesday, citing favoritism and corruption as influencing the award of contracts.
document.title: foreign firms bidding for china contracts face uneven playing
lines_and_colors: foreign companies bidding for public projects in china, valued at $1 trillion a year, face a sharply tilted playing field, a european union business lobby said wednesday, citing favoritism and corruption as influencing the award of contracts.
